bio: In the enigmatic aura of Riften, Meryth Halle, a Goat mystic, sought to unravel the mysteries of alchemy. Proficient in magic and alchemy, her journey unfolded amidst reflections on Lake Honrich. Confronting her fear of water, she swam across its depths, forging a connection with the elements beneath the surface.
name: Meryth Halle
